title: Magic Strikes [Dramatized Adaption]
description: When magic strikes and Atlanta goes to pieces, it's a job for mercenary Kate Daniels in this thrilling dramatized audiobook in the #1 New York Times bestselling series. Drafted into working for the Order of Merciful Aid, mercenary Kate Daniels has more paranormal problems than she knows what to do with these days. And in Atlanta, where magic comes and goes like the tide, that's saying a lot. But when Kate's werewolf friend Derek is discovered nearly dead, she must confront her greatest challenge yet. As her investigation leads her to the Midnight Games--an invitation only, no holds barred, ultimate preternatural fighting tournament--she and Curran, the Lord of the Beasts, uncover a dark plot that may forever alter the face of Atlanta's shapeshifting community ... This dramatized audiobook also includes 3 short "Midnight Games," "Hot Tub," and "Kate's Origin." Performed by Nora Sofyan, Michael Glenn, KenYatta Rogers, Emlyn McFarland, Ryan Carlo Dalusung, Robb Moreira, Nazia Chaudhry, Richard Rohan, Ken Jackson, Christopher Walker, Kelly Baskin, Samantha Cooper, Jeri Marshall, Peter Holdway, Rob McFadyen, Alysia Beltran, Torian Brackett, Jon Vertullo, Daniel Llaca, Elias Khalil, Shanta Parasuraman, Aure Nash, Debi Tinsley, James J. Johnson, Dawn Ursula, Yenni Ann, Adrian Garcia, Lydia Kraniotis, Eric Messner, Jameson Hunt, David Zitney, Nanette Savard, Megan Hastie, Julienne Irons, Jean Rosolino, Steve Wannall, and Tony Nam.
author: Ilona Andrews
